entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
